attributes.action: Stop any additional Government funding for EU referendum Remain Campaign.
attributes.additional_details: As the Government has seen fit to spend £9.2 million on one free distribution of information to voters, this clearly demonstrates they have taken the lead in Remain campaign. The distribution of a one sided booklet with a view to remain in the EU, and exceed the campaign limit, undermines the objectives of the Referendum and demonstrates a lack of integrity.
attributes.background: The Electoral commission has put a spending limit of £7 million for each of the Lead campaign groups (Remain or Leave) in the EU referendum.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament.  You could start a petition calling on the Government to not use any public money on publishing documents which make the case for the UK remaining in the EU.
